General.Name: Laser Tek Taiwan Co Ltd
General.Description: Laser Tek Taiwan Co.,Ltd provides surface mounted devices (SMD) packaging materials and surface mounted technology (SMT) equipment in Taiwan and internationally. It offers SMD products, including un-punched paper carrier tapes, pre-punched paper carrier tapes, top and bottom tapes, embossed carrier and cover tapes, and plastic reels; SMD processing equipment comprising winding machines, punching machines, and tapping machines; and SMD processing related spare parts, such as tungsten cutting blades, punch dies, squeegees, and test and guide plates. The company also provides laser services, including passive components, PCB/FPCB, laser marking, and LED substrate drilling. In addition, it offers LED products, which include tubes, T-bars, bulb lights, down lights, spot lights, color spot lights, special yellow tubes, high bay lights, street lights, and flood lights for indoor and outdoor applications; photocatalyst, activated carbon, dust, and HEPA high efficiency filters, and UV lamps; anti-epidemic patch products; double cool air conditioning systems; power line Ethernet bridges; and air cleaners. Further, the company provides energy saving products; and inspection systems, furnace equipment and thermotracker, and laser systems. Laser Tek Taiwan Co.,Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
